subject: Re: Phonak digital marketing catalogue - Roger V3 items for upload
preview: @chris this ticket is not automaically recorded, just don't add the website in the tag.

full_threads.body: @chris this ticket is not automaically recorded, just don't add the website in the tag.

Hi Chris, Thanks for sending through. Looks good, just a few items to amend please:
  • Please delete Roger On V2 pamphlet
  • Update text: Phonak Roger On V3 pamphlet (delete consumer)
Add part number: 028-2488-48 Add: Click to order Thanks, Melinda
hi @rica, can you please delete the autotracked time for this ticket? I have added it to the Momentum Tracker.

Hi Melinda, 

Thanks for the follow up. 

Confirming the requested changes have been completed, you can see them here: https://phonakmarketing.com.au/roger/

Please review and let us know of any further changes.

https://phonakmarketing.com.au/roger/
@chris please check. done updating the Roger page.
(Time:90mins)
@glen I sent you the files in Slack

HI Glen,

Please try this link:

Roger V3

I have also sent the link the support email address directly from my OneDrive.

Please let me know if you have any issues accessing.

Regards,

Melinda

Hi Guys,

Can you also make the following updates for the Roger catalogue:

In the new 'Roger V3' category please create the following tiles with the same names as below and add the content to it Roger V3 LAM Tools



Regards,

Nikki

Hi Melinda,

I hope you're doing well. I tried accessing the file through the provided link, but it seems to be broken or no longer available. Could you please send a new link or provide an alternative way to access the file?

Additionally, could you kindly add support@wolfiq.com.au as a user ?

Thank you for your assistance, and I look forward to your response.

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi all,


Can you please arrange for upload of the below items highlighted in green (the yellow items I am still waiting on) and amend the Roger On V2 tab to be called Roger On V3 in the Phonak DMC.


Are we able to have this live by Friday this week?


Can you please send through the initial amendments on a backlink until we are able to make this live Friday morning?





I have added the above excel to the sharepoint file, it also has a number of items that need to be removed from Roger On V2 section.


Please see below the link for the sharepoint file.


Roger V3




Regards,


Melinda



Melinda O'Brien
Phonak Marketing Manager
